title: AWS launches Kiro powers with Stripe, Figma, and Datadog integrations for AI-assisted coding
description: Amazon Web Services’ new Kiro powers let AI coding assistants load specialized tools like Stripe and Figma on demand, cutting token costs and speeding software development.
content: Amazon Web Services on Wednesday introduced Kiro powers, a system that allows software developers to give their AI coding assistants instant, specialized expertise in specific tools and workflows add… [+8950 chars]
